attributes.action: appoint Richard Littlejohn to the cabinet as Minister for Common Sense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown has stated that he wishes to appoint a cabinet of all the talents.
Mr Littlejohn has a remarkable talent as a person with a vision to see and articulate what the overwhelming majority of his countrymen see.
Sadly for us all he has chosen not to pursue a career in the house of commons, however under Mr Browns new criterea of appointing all the talents it is essential that we are represented by someone who is from the real world and views policies and behaviour from a common sense viewpoint (A commodity missing in government for 10 years)
